results.title: Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@Verapamil@@@ on @GENE_ANGPT2 @GENE_285 @@@Angiopoietin 2@@@ and @GENE_COL18A1 @GENE_80781 @@@Endostatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@Hypertensive Diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@Nephropathy@@@: A Randomized Trial.

results.title: Potential Role of Lisinopril in Reducing Atherosclerotic Risk: Evidence of an Antioxidant Effect in Human Cardiomyocytes Cell Line
results.text_hl: Recently, it has been shown that @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ can attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal oxidative injury@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@l-NAME@@@-induced @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ and cause an impressive improvement in the antioxidant defense system of Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@.

citations.NLM: Scisciola L, Fontanella RA, Surina, Garofalo G, Rizzo MR, Paolisso G, Barbieri M. Potential Role of Lisinopril in Reducing Atherosclerotic Risk: Evidence of an Antioxidant Effect in Human Cardiomyocytes Cell Line Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():868365. PMID: 35656292

results.title: Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension.
results.text_hl: The present study examined if controlling @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ with @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@, or given in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, slows the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal injury@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Williams JM, Murphy SR, Wu W, Border JJ, Fan F, Roman RJ. Renoprotective effects of empagliflozin in type 1 and type 2 models of diabetic nephropathy superimposed with hypertension. Geroscience. 2022 Dec;44(6):2845-2861. PMID: 35767209

results.title: Chronic Kidney Disease of Non-traditional Etiology in a Young Man From Central America: Geography, Poverty, and Uncertain Pathophysiology Create a Formidable Medical Challenge
results.text_hl: Although @DISEASE_Glomerulosclerosis_Focal_Segmental @DISEASE_MESH:D005923 @@@FSGS@@@ would be a rare manifestation, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s risk factors strongly suggested @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease of unknown@@@ etiology (CKDu) - also known as @DISEASE_Chronic_Kidney_Diseases_of_Uncertain_Etiology @DISEASE_MESH:D000092702 @@@Mesoamerican nephropathy@@@ (@DISEASE_Chronic_Kidney_Diseases_of_Uncertain_Etiology @DISEASE_MESH:D000092702 @@@MeN@@@) - a phenomenon he had never previously heard of. He took @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for the last six years to manage his @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Milki AA, Bechara M, Lew SQ, Poon AN. Chronic Kidney Disease of Non-traditional Etiology in a Young Man From Central America: Geography, Poverty, and Uncertain Pathophysiology Create a Formidable Medical Challenge Cureus. 2023 May;15(5):e38876. PMID: 37303355
citations.BibTeX: @article{37303355, title={Chronic Kidney Disease of Non-traditional Etiology in a Young Man From Central America: Geography, Poverty, and Uncertain Pathophysiology Create a Formidable Medical Challenge}, author={Milki AA and Bechara M and Lew SQ and Poon AN}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={5}, pages={e38876}}

results.title: Navigating Fabry Disease in a Military Aviator.
results.text_hl: Initial evaluations revealed @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@proteinuric kidney disease@@@ and an otherwise normal neurological workup indicating early @DISEASE_Fabry_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000795 @@@FD@@@, prompting initiation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ for @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ prevention, and the newly Food and Drug Administration-approved chaperone therapy @CHEMICAL_migalastat @CHEMICAL_MESH:C090092 @@@migalastat@@@.

citations.NLM: Carlock T, Kincaid-Sharp E, Orsello C, Ford AW, El-Khoury BB. Navigating Fabry Disease in a Military Aviator. Aerosp Med Hum Perform. 2025 Jun;96(6):525-529. PMID: 40642858
